title: Corporate Pioneer: An Interview with Bonnie Wurzbacher - Part 2
itunes:title: Corporate Pioneer: An Interview with Bonnie Wurzbacher - Part 2
description: Welcome back to the second session of a two-part interview with Bonnie Wurzbacher, former Sr. V.P. of Global Customer Leadership at Coca-Cola and Chief Development Officer at World Vision International from 2013-2017.
content:encoded: Welcome back to the second session of a two-part interview with Bonnie Wurzbacher, former Sr. V.P. of Global Customer Leadership at Coca-Cola and Chief Development Officer at World Vision International from 2013-2017.
